propertyInfos.label: Background image
propertyInfos.hint: Image to use for the start page background.
propertyInfos.name: startBackground

propertyInfos.label: Brand color
propertyInfos.hint: Color to use as the primary color.
propertyInfos.name: brandColor

propertyInfos.label: Base font size
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the base font size used throughout the app.
propertyInfos.name: baseFontSize

propertyInfos.label: Title font file
propertyInfos.name: mediumFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom title font to be used throughout the app. This font will be used in headings, page titles, and so on.

propertyInfos.label: Text font file
propertyInfos.name: regularFontTTF
propertyInfos.hint: Sets the custom text font to be used throughout the app. This font will be used in descriptions of photos, about text, and so on.

propertyInfos.label: Feedback email
propertyInfos.hint: Email address where user feedback will be sent.
propertyInfos.name: feedbackEmail

propertyInfos.label: Show disclaimer
propertyInfos.hint: Shows the disclaimer text as a pop-up in the app. This text is the content from the 'Access and Use Constraints' section of the Details tab.
propertyInfos.name: showDisclaimer

propertyInfos.label: Maps query
propertyInfos.hint: Enter an ArcGIS query to select web maps or mobile map packages (MMPKs) to display in the gallery. This can be any valid string such as 'USA', a valid item ID such as id:5ae9e138a17842688b0b79283a4353f6, a valid group ID such as group:52dc7e19ba2f4ea9bb513c02855535ea, or a search query such as (id:5ae9e138a17842688b0b79283a4353f6 OR id:b361c4467db248e7ad55b6e7661e5706). Note: you must sign in to view the mmpks which are not created using the ArcGIS Pro Publisher extension with anonymous use enabled.
propertyInfos.name: galleryMapsQuery

propertyInfos.label: Total results to show in gallery
propertyInfos.hint: Enter the maximum number of web maps that should be returned from querying the portal.
propertyInfos.name: maxNumberOfQueryResults

propertyInfos.label: Portal url
propertyInfos.hint: URL of the ArcGIS portal to query for web maps.
propertyInfos.name: portalUrl

propertyInfos.label: Basemaps group ID:
propertyInfos.hint: Lists the basemaps from the provided group.
propertyInfos.name: baseMapsGroupId

propertyInfos.label: Support secured maps
propertyInfos.hint: Provides the ability to sign in to an organization for access to secured web maps and mobile map packages (MMPKs), as per the query parameters.
propertyInfos.name: supportSecuredMaps

propertyInfos.label: Skip sign in
propertyInfos.hint: Provides the ability to bypass sign-in and only show publicly available web maps and MMPKs created using the ArcGIS Pro Publisher extension with anonymous use enabled. The default is true.
propertyInfos.name: enableAnonymousAccess

propertyInfos.label: Support editing
propertyInfos.hint: Setting this option to true enables the editing of feature geometry, attributes, and attachments if the feature layer is editable and the user has permission to edit features.
propertyInfos.name: supportEditing
mapTypes
propertyInfos.hint: Specifies the type of maps displayed in the Map Viewer gallery. There are three possible values: showWebMapsOnly will only display online web maps, showOfflineMapsOnly will only display mobile map packages, and showBoth will display both web maps and MMPKs.
propertyInfos.label: Maps to show in Gallery
Portal sort field
propertyInfos.hint: Specifies the name of the field used to perform the sort of web maps shown in the gallery. Possible values include title, created, type, owner, modified, avgRating, numRatings, numComments, and numViews. The default is modified.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortField

propertyInfos.label: Portal sort order
propertyInfos.hint: Specifies the order of web maps shown in the gallery in either ascending or descending order based on the designated portalSortField. The default is desc.
propertyInfos.name: portalSortOrder
